answers.answer: Hi!A heat sensation or sudden feeling of warmth can be a sign of blood clot or deep vein thrombosis. It can also be due to pinched nerve or due to diabetic neuropathy. If you are a female and on birth control pills, then this could be due to the side effect of pills as they can also cause deep vein thrombosis. For diagnosis first a duplex ultrasound or color dopplar would need to be done. If this is negative then a nerve conduction study and test for diabetes. If there is a chance then if everything else is negative, then lupus may need to be tested for. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: HI, i feel  a very warm sensation throught my arms  most off all the time, special if  i fold my arms... what my  be  this??
title: need  information
